description: A thief who wears a fox-mask whom http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata] has been pursuing for 20 over years. Also known as 怪盗 狐火の長五郎 (Kaitou Kitsunebi no Chougorou) aka Crazy Bandit Chougorou of Will o`the Wisp (lit.fox-spirit fire) in the past, a 9-member ninja group of bandits, he has since left the group, after saving http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata Heiji] (who was still a small kid then), giving him a chest of money and burning down his bandit group`s hideout to distract them.
name: Kitsunebi no Chougorou
